00027  public:

00033   HomgLineSeg2D (double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1);
00034   ~HomgLineSeg2D () {}
00035 
00036   // Data Access---------------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00038   // get the line through the two points.

00046 };
